name: It won't get any worse, and then - BAM
name_original: It won't get any worse, and then - BAM
description:
Theme: The Murphy's Law

----------------------

It is an Unreal Engine 4 project about a boy who loves breaking rules and fishing. One day his passion for this kind of thing leads him into a cycle of failure and strange coincidences.

----------------------

WASD - basic movement;

ctrl - crouch mode;

shift - run mode;

E - interact;

TAB - inventory;

space - jump;
